definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: Hb Hab 1:16) food—´[[מ]] Ge 2:9 + 21 t.; cstr. [[מַאֲכַל]] Ge 40:7 + 3 t.; sf. [[מַאֲכָֽלְךָ]] Ez Eze 4:10; [[מַאֲכָלוֹ]] Hb Hab 1:16; [[מַאֲכָלָהּ]] Pr 6:8; [[מַאֲכַלְכֶם]] Da 1:10—food, in genl. Ge 6:21, 1Ki 10:5 = 2Ch 9:4, Hag 2:12; opp. drink Ezr 3:7, 2Ch 11:11, Da 1:10; [[מַאֲכַל תַּאֲוׇה]] Job 33:20; fig. of peoples as fishes, food for Chaldeans Hb Hab 1:16; appl. to fruit Ge 2:9, Ge 3:6 (of tree ´[[טוֹב לְמ]]) cf. ´[[עֵץ־מ]] Le 19:23, De 20:20, Ne 9:25, Ez Eze 47:12, Eze 47:12; appl. to [[דָּגׇן]] Is 62:8; appl. to honey Ju Is 14:14; to flour 1Ch 12:41 where appos. [[קֶמַח]]; to food of ants Pr 6:8 (‖[[לָחֶם]]); to baker's work Ge 40:17 cf. Ez Eze 4:10; appl. to carcasses, as food for beasts & birds of prey De 28:26, Ps 79:2 cf. Ps 44:12 (´[[חאׁן מ]], sim. of suffering people) Je 7:33, Je 16:4, Je 19:7, Je 34:20, Ps 74:14.
